<<<<<<< HEAD
The Whigg intelligencer, or, Sir Samuel in the pound for publishing scandalous and seditious letters, for which he was fin'd 10000£. on Saturday, April 19.
1 sheet ([1] p.) : music.
Printed for the information and terror of all libellers, [London] : 1684.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library. Broadside. In Verse to the tune of "Hark, the thund'ring cannons roar". Includes music.
=======
